Reading for January:  "Tricycle - The Buddhist Review" Winter 2011 (Magazine)

We don’t normally read magazines, but this issue of Tricycle is one of the best, and will provide great material for discussion. The articles include: “From Thought to Stillness – Breathing Life into the Suttas” by Rodney Smith; “Living Buddhism” by Dharmavidya David Brazier; “The Joy of Giving” by Gil Fronsdal;  “Compassion Restored,” an interview with Karen Armstrong;  “Primordial Soup” by Andrew Olendzki; “G-20 Dharma – Nonviolence and engaged living” by Michael Stone; and “Pain Passion & The Precepts” by Bodhin Kjolhede.
